New Records: South Africa have equalled the record for most individual centuries in a single edition of World Cup.
South Africa have broken the record of most sixes hit in a single edition.
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored a 103-ball century.
Rassie van der Dussen brought up his second century in the tournament, hitting his century off 101 balls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa finished their innings with 357 runs for the loss of 4 wickets.
